original_title: Sex And The City XXX Parody: In Search Of The Screaming O
overview: Carrie, Charlotte, Samanha and Miranda are all laughs and cheers over their latest invention and it is not a new type of Martini. These ladies are in search of pleasure and they are here to take you on their walk down memory lane as they search for the The Screaming O!
title: Sex And The City XXX Parody: In Search Of The Screaming O
